com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram

Class UserProfileController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301fa16t5.legendary_telegram.UserProfileController

  • public class UserProfileController
extends java.lang.Object
    User Profile Controller, checks if entered information is any good. Does all the parsing of information from User Activity to see if it's correct. If it is, uses CentralController to proceed further with data edits.
    Author:
    kgmills

      • attemptEditUser

        public UserProfileEnum attemptEditUser(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String email,
                                       java.lang.String phone,
                                       java.lang.String vehicle)
        this method will be used when the UserProfile Activity is called from MainRequestActivity
        Parameters:
        name - String type username from Edit Text
        email - String type email from Edit Text
        phone - String type phone from Edit Text
        vehicle - String type from Edit Text
        Returns:
        Enum describing if the input was good or bad.

      • attemptNewUser

        public UserProfileEnum attemptNewUser(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String email,
                                      java.lang.String phone,
                                      java.lang.String vehicle)
        Attempts to create a new user.
        Parameters:
        name - The new user's name.
        email - Their email
        phone - Their phone number
        vehicle - Their vehicle description (optional)
        Returns:
        Enum describing if the attempt was good or bad.

      • checkUserInput

        private UserProfileEnum checkUserInput(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String email,
                                       java.lang.String phone)
        This function checks the Username, Email, and Phone fields for proper syntax. It does not check the Username to see if it's already taken, that has been handled before this function would be called. We do not check the vehicle field for brand, year, etc. The user can put WHATEVER they want there, the queation is, will what they put appeal to potential Riders?
        Parameters:
        name - The string entered to the Username
        email - The string entered to the Email
        phone - The string entered to the phone field.
        Returns:
        An Enum describing the validity or problem with the inputs.

      • getProfileData

        public java.lang.String[] getProfileData()
        Gets the information needed to fill the views in the event that we are editing a user profile.
        Returns:
        A String[] containing the username, email, telephone and vehicle fields.

      • invalidateName

        public boolean invalidateName(java.lang.String username)
        Checks to see if the String corresponds to an existing username (or is invalid, like "");
        Parameters:
        username - The String to be checked.
        Returns:
        True if username is invalid. False otherwise.
